
### selected special IPv4 addresses  {.smaller}


* 127.0.0.0 --- 127.255.255.255 --- localhost 

   * AKA loopback
   * the machine we're on
   * typically only 127.0.0.1 is used

* 192.168.0.0--192.168.255.255 and <br> 10.0.0.0--10.255.255.255 and <br> 172.16.0.0--172.31.255.255  

   * ‘‘private’’ IP addresses
   * not used on the Internet
   * commonly connected to Internet with <em>network address translation</em>
   * also 100.64.0.0--100.127.255.255 (but with restrictions)

* 169.254.0.0-169.254.255.255 

   * link-local addresses --- ‘never’ forwarded by routers
